name: koinon-rms
description: Koinon Church Management System - monorepo root

scripts.graph:update: npm run graph:backend && npm run graph:frontend && npm run graph:merge
scripts.graph:validate: npm run graph:update && npm run graph:verify && git diff --quiet tools/graph/graph-baseline.json || (echo 'Graph drift detected - run npm run graph:update and commit' && exit 1)
scripts.test: dotnet test && npm run --prefix src/web test
